name: 太陽能班排長

func:
TableData = flow.get("SaveData")||[];

TableData.unshift({
            "Time": new Date().toLocaleString("TW",{ hour12: false }),
            //"contry code": msg.contry_code.payload,
            //"area code": msg.area_code.payload,
            //"local area": msg.local_area.payload,
            "sort id": msg.sort_id.payload,
            //"data qty": msg.data_number.payload,
            "T1_00": msg.T1_00.payload,
            "T2_00": msg.T2_00.payload,
            "V0_00": msg.V0_00.payload,
            "T1_01": msg.T1_01.payload,
            "T2_01": msg.T2_01.payload,
            "V0_01": msg.V0_01.payload,
            "T1_02": msg.T1_02.payload,
            "T2_02": msg.T2_02.payload,
            "V0_02": msg.V0_02.payload,
            "T1_03": msg.T1_03.payload,
            "T2_03": msg.T2_03.payload,
            "V0_03": msg.V0_03.payload,
            "T1_04": msg.T1_04.payload,
            "T2_04": msg.T2_04.payload,
            "V0_04": msg.V0_04.payload,
            "T1_05": msg.T1_05.payload,
            "T2_05": msg.T2_05.payload,
            "V0_05": msg.V0_05.payload,
            "T1_06": msg.T1_06.payload,
            "T2_06": msg.T2_06.payload,
            "V0_06": msg.V0_06.payload,
        })
        
if (TableData.length > 5) TableData.pop();
msg.payload = TableData;
flow.set("SaveData",TableData)
return msg;
